title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Ye sab shuru hua bachpan mein, rangon se khelte hue. Tab pata nahi tha ki ye mera passion ban jaayega.
Anushka: School mein drawing competitions mein hissa leti thi. Jeeti bhi, haari bhi, lekin seekhti rahi.
Anushka: Phir college mein fine arts join kiya. Wahan pata chala, kala sirf painting nahi, ek duniya hai.
Anushka: Kai tarah ke mediums try kiye - oil paints, watercolors, even sculpting. Har cheez mein kuch naya mila.
Anushka: Lekin sach kahun toh, raasta aasaan nahi tha. Kai baar laga, shayad main sahi nahi hoon.
Anushka: Par jab bhi aisa laga, maine firse shuru kiya. Apne dil ki suni.
Anushka: Ab main ek artist hoon. Paintings banati hoon. Logon ko apni kala se khushi deti hoon.
Anushka: Aur yeh sab, sirf rangon se shuru hua tha! Dhanyavaad!
